name: I WONDER IF I HAD A YOUNGER SISTER
name_original: I WONDER IF I HAD A YOUNGER SISTER
description:
html version: click me

This is a game inspired by Undertale. I discovered that danmaku (bullet screen) games is a good media to express the madness of main character. So it comes to my mind that a Syuraba (tension between multiple girl friends) is a good idea for this jam’s theme. So there it is.
It is a fanart game. I used characters in three sister-themed animes:

  • Umaru in Himouto
  • Sagiri in Eromanga Sensei
  • Shana in Shakugan no Shana

This game was created within [TIC-80 fantasy console](https://tic.computer/). Thanks to NesBox

[Controls]

  • [x] jump
  • [left/right arrows] move
